title: Romantic
lyrics:
Don't take me to dinner
Just take me back home
Don't take me to Venice
Just take me back home
Don't take me for granted

I'm not the kind of girl



Don't bribe me red roses

Don't be such a poser

Don't try to seduce me too

You like me ecstatic

I know I'll regret it

If I don't tell it straight to you

I'm not romantic

I'm not romantic

Don't be dramatic

'Cause I'm not romantic



Don't ask me to tango

Just take me back home

Don't be a fandango

Just take me back home



Don't take me for granted

I'm not the kind of girl



Don't bribe me red roses

Don't be such a poser

Don't try to seduce me too

You like me ecstatic

I know I'll regret it

If I don't tell it straight to you

I'm not romantic

I'm not romantic

Don't be dramatic

'Cause I'm not romantic



Don't bribe me red roses

Don't be such a poser

Don't try to seduce me too

You like me ecstatic

I know I'll regret it

If I don't tell it straight to you

I'm not romantic

I'm not romantic

Don't be dramatic

'Cause I'm not romantic

I'm not romantic
